summary: HOMECNDLLAUNCH DAPPTEAMDOCS - A functional, modern and automated approach to trading on-chain. Millions of data points working for you in a matter of seconds. Utilizing historical and real-time on-chain data about thousands of actively traded tokens. Our algorithms execute trade strategies that capitalize on market movements before they are reflected in any trading tool or chart. The $CNDL token underpins the trading ecosystem with a total supply of 100 million tokens, of which 90 million are put into immediate circulation. The dynamics of $CNDL tokenomics are tailored to encourage stable growth and rewards all holders, those staking and not. The $CNDL token acts as your key to access all the trading platform and the wider ecosystem has to offer. The developer team is experienced in the field of blockchain polling with history and experience working in the largest API providers and on-chain data collection companies. The core team consists of 3 founders, 5 developers who have combined their experience to bring about CNDL and make it the premier automated trading system on the market.
